modName: Noldorian Hadhafang Reborn and other Elven Blades
summary: This mod adds a new HD version of the fantastic Hadhafang from the LotR movies and a few variants based on the same model. These weapons are both elegant and deadly.
descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic][color=Green][u][b][size=+3]Noldorian Hadhafang Reborn and other Elven Blades[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]




[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]About this Mod[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]This mod offers a new HD version of the famous sword Hadhafang from the fantastic LotR movies, based on the fantastic model by Yogensya as well as other colour and material variants of this outstanding beauty of a blade.

It is completely standalone and can be crafted with Elven smithing perk under the Elven category at any forge. Of course it is fully temperable and enchantable, too.

The textures of the main version are quite big, but can be used without problems as all of my various testers have reported. I chose to keep them uncompressed for the best possible texture quality and look. A performance version will be added soon, but I really recommend to use the main uncompressed version.

About the looks of it images can say more than thousand words of mine - especially since I had the honour to be able to get some of the greatest screenarchers on the Nexus as beta testers for my work. Be sure to check out their remarkable work in the gallery on this front page and in the image section of this mod.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Video Reviews[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]

[youtube]7Lzi4JOINpQ[/youtube]
by Seren4xx

[youtube]mpdsDHNheds[/youtube]
by misalen


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]The Variants[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AUhRuGTl.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]Hadhafang Reborn is the original version of this sword and well known as Arwen's sword from the fantastic LotR movies by Peter Jackson. It is a very powerful and elegant weapon and has gone unspoiled through the ages of the world as it has been forged in Gondolin in the forgotten 1st age of the world.It has been passed from mother to child and has been wielded both by men and by women through its long and famous history.

On the blade the following inscription in Sindarin can be found :

"aen estar Hadhafang I chatholhen, thand around dan I thang an I arwen"

"This blade is called Hadhafang, a noble defense of a noble lady against a mass of enemies."

[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vJb8dUPl.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Silver Elven Blade uses the same model as Hadhafang itself, but is crafted with lighter oakwood and metal parts in silver steel. It is an example of a classic Noldorian Elven sword, which is light and deadly - perfect for a swift and agile fighting style, which requires lots of skill and training, but provides unrivalled power when it comes to a duel of blades on the battlefield.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nnigOqsl.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]Silverized Hadhafang offers the same chestnut wood and blade like Hadhafang reborn, but the metal parts at the hilt are crafted with silver steel instead of gold.[/size][/color]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r5cJMZ5l.jpg[/IMG]

[size=+1][color=lightblue]The Golden Elven Blade offers a beautiful combination of light oakwood, golden metal and decorative elements and a pure and shiny blade. It is a weapon of both power and splendor.[/size][/color]



[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Requirements[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Skyrim 1.8+ is required for this mod to work. No further mods are required as this is completely standalone.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Installation[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue] Choose ONE of the variants and download the mod file and extract the file into your skyrim directory, e.g. C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData and say "yes" when being asked to integrate and override.

Optional files require ONE of the main files. Simply overwrite them with NMM or manually and you can choose the optional colour scheme of your choice.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Un-installation[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Delete the file via NMM or manually by deleting the files contained in the mod folder within your Skyrim "Textures" folder.[/size][/color]


[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Compatibility[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]As this is a standalone mod it is compatible with everything except Yogensya's oringinal Hadhafang mod.[/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Credits[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]Credits go to...

- Yogensya for the creation of this beautiful model and his friendly permission to use it for this mod -> check out his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8456]original mod[/url]
- Bethesda for creating the gaming masterpiece Skyrim and the HD texture packs
- Professor Tolkien who made a fact-loving lawyer and historician believe in magic again, the day I discovered his unique and ever outstanding work back in 2001
- Peter Jackson and WETA Workshop for being a great inspiration for this mod
- Lana del Rey, Howard Shore, Harry Gregson-Williams, Richard Wagner, Giacomo Puccini and others for helping me through endless hours of modding work

and last but absolutely not least to my fantastic group of friends and beta testers :[/size][/color]

[font=century gothic][color=YELLOW][u][b][size=+2]Author's note[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]


[size=+1][color=lightblue]If you like this mod please take a second to show your apprechiation and endorse it, leave a comment or load up a picture - I'd be really grateful for it, since I have put many hours of work and a lot of determination into it. If you enjoy a mod a few clicks should not be too much to ask for. If you face any issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution.[/size][/color]
